actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the termination date with respect to the authority to award court costs and certain fees in tax cases.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the authority of a court to award court costs and certain fees to the prevailing party in a tax case.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the termination date with respect to the authority to award court costs and certain fees in tax cases.
